text:
On "clear" tomcat 3.2.1 just change     <RequestInterceptor
        className="org.apache.tomcat.request.SessionInterceptor"
        noCookies="true" /> 
and run the following simple test.jsp. New session will be generated each time you press the button!


test.jsp:
---------
<%@ page session="true" %>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE> Sessions problem </TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY>

tomcat 3.2.1 and 3.2.2 BUG! If you have noCookies=true, in server.xml
<%= session.getId() %>
will change - the old sesssion is lost.

<FORM method="post" action="test.jsp">
    <INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" NAME="Submit" VALUE="Submit">
</FORM>


</BODY>
</HTML>
